fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Use 1 bee to sting a player, preventing them from using an abiliity the following night.
- Use 2 bees to investigate a player, learning their role.
- Use 3 bees to deal a Powerful attack to a player.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You will earn 1 bee every night. You may use up to two bee abilities each night.
- All other players have your other abilities and attributes in addition to their own.
